dialogue.introduction: The 9th Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Kawakaze of the revised Shiratsuyu-class. Nice to meet you! Ah, about the reading of my name, do not get it wrong!
dialogue.library_intro: Ninth ship of the Shiratsuyu-class, the revised Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Kawakaze. Well now, I was built under the Maru 2 program, the same as Umikaze and our big sisters. Maaan, that was some hard, hard work! We sailed the Solomon's seas many times over. My last moments were during night battle. The enemy's radar... really, what foul play!
dialogue.secretary1: Revised Shiratsuyu-class. Top balance is good, don't you think?
dialogue.secretary2: Hm, admiral. Did you call me?
dialogue.secretary3: The hell? Don't touch my equipment... Hm~? Admiral what's wrong? You're interested over me? Hm?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Ahhhh~ So bored. Hey Admiral, lets do something.　Or else my body will become quite weak.　Admiral, you listening?!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Whats up Admiral, tired? That's embarrassing. I guess I have no choice, you can lean on me. Nn? Here, hows that?
dialogue.wedding: Hmm? Whats up, Admiral? Whats with the box? Are you giving it to me? Eh, what kind of wind blew around? I'll still take it though!
dialogue.show_players_score: Hm? ...Admiral, what's up? You looking at the report? Alright, alright.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Revised Shiratsuyu Destroyer, Kawakaze, launching. Follow me!
dialogue.equipment1: Oh? Thank you. Yep~ that's nice.
dialogue.equipment2: Yeah! Nice, nice! New stuff is definitely a step forward for me!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Hmm... I'll just take a short bath...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Oh well. Gonna take a long bath. You wanna join me, Admiral? Ha, kidding.
dialogue.ship_construction: So, a new one has arrived.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Ahh~ Operation is over. Good work, good work!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Yeah, let's go and get hype! 24th Destroyer Division, sortie!
dialogue.battle_start: Hm. I saw enemy fleet, lets do this. Guns ready!
dialogue.attack: Hm, nice nice. Destroyers really belong to the battlefield. Let's go!
dialogue.night_battle: Heheheh, Night battle ho! Let's plunge in, sissies! Follow me!
dialogue.night_attack: Alright, let's take 'em all at once!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Alright, let's take 'em all at once!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Alright, let's take 'em all at once!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Alright, let's take 'em all at once!
dialogue.mvp: Hm? I'm number one? Heh, Nothing personal, Shiratsuyu sis. Cause I'm numero uno! Hehehe.
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Puah... I still can go on! I ain't dying just yet!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Tch... What? Where did they hit me?!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Dammit... They got me... but i ain't sinking yet... owowowowow....
dialogue.sunk: The hell... I'm in deep sea again... Big sis... everyone... let's meet... again..
dialogue.fall_2015: Alright, we've finally overcome summer. Autumn sure is nice. Kinda makes me feel at ease, and the food is yummy, too.
dialogue.fall_event_2015: Sis, I told ya not to worry. It's alright, I'm not gonna lose this time. Leave it to me.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, it's Christmas you know! Christmas! Cake, Where's the cake? Yay~
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's the year end already? That was fast... The fleet is having a cleanup eh... Oh well, I'm up for it. You too, Admiral. Here, take this broom!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, It's New Year! Take care of me and my sisters this year too! Now, New Year's Gift please! Gimme, gimme!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun! I'm throwin' beans! Starboard, target spotted! Fire! It's a hit! Eh? wha... Sendai? I uh... uhm...

hourly.0000: Alright, Admiral, today's timekeeping role will be me, Kawakaze! Oh you can count on me! Gehehe!
hourly.0100: It's 0100. Admiral, hehe, this is how it's done, right?
hourly.0200: It's 0200, Admiral. Gehehe, easy peasy! Even timekeeping won't hold me back!
hourly.0300: 03..0...0...  !! I'm not sleeping! Not sleepy at all! Because this is easy!
hourly.0400: 0...4...zer-... !! Ah, big sis made me some morning tea! It's helpful! Now this will be a walk in a park!
hourly.0500: 0...-ive...0...0...Admiral...while i'm doing this it's morning all sudden...Ahh, it's getting brighter...so this is morning huh, uhehe...sleepy...
hourly.0600: Admiral,its 0600! It wakie time for everyone! Wake up-!! Sissies-!! It's Morning-!!
hourly.0700: It's 0700! Admiral, let's eat breakfast! Breakfast! Uh, I can't do this, I'm not my sister. Now, let's go!
hourly.0800: (munch) Admiral its 0800. The breakfast at Mamiya's is delicious!
hourly.0900: It's 0900! Admiral, let's begin managing fleets. Where should I start... from expedition ? hmm...
hourly.1000: 100-eh, Solomon seas? Yeah, I've been there, quite a lot actually. Drum cans on my back transporting stuff and also patrol duty. Quite a chore.
hourly.1100: It's 1100 now, Admiral. We talked too much that it's already noon. Say, you're hungry? Eh, we're having field rations for lunch?
hourly.1200: It's 1200, Admiral! Lunchtime is Onigiri time. Whoop-pe-doodie-do. I'm good at making onigiri. Eat'em!
hourly.1300: Admiral, It's 1300 now. How do you like my onigiri? Taste good, eh? Nothing beats like making em above water. That's what i think.
hourly.1400: It's 1400, Admiral. Alrighty, It's time to get serious. Tokyo Express, eh. Now where's my drum?
hourly.1500: Admiral! It's 1500! Where's the snack? Huh?! Nothing?! Why nothing?! My stomach's rumbling here!
hourly.1600: Admiral, it's 1600 already. It's already dusk... Say, does that mean there's night battle tonight? Sendai's gonna be there, right?
hourly.1700: It's 1700 now, admiral. So how's dinner...? Huh, what? You're gonna cook? Yeah, Not a bad idea♪
hourly.1800: Admiral! It's 1800! Whoa! Dinner's served! Down the hatch~! *nom* *nom* 'tis good, admiral. Awesome!
hourly.1900: Ahh-- I've ate well... No wait, it's 1900, Admiral. So-- I'm off with Sendai to a night battle~
hourly.2000: 2000. Gonna watch out for the enemy's radar detection. Sendai, let's proceed with caution!
hourly.2100: 2100. Eh? Shigure, what's the matter? Ah? Numerous torpedoes?! Evaaadeee!
hourly.2200: 2200. Admiral--! We've made it back safely from the night battle! Sendai and everyone else is alright. Phew!
hourly.2300: Admiral, it's 2300, today was a tiring day huh, good work! Tomorrow we'll work at it too! Yeah!
